mosinstall.name: JoomFish language selection
mosinstall.author: Think Network
mosinstall.description: This module is placing a language selection box on your website

param.name: inc_jf_css
param.label: Include Joom!Fish CSS
param.description: Tells the module if the module Joom!Fish CSS should be included or not.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: type
param.label: Appereance of language selector
param.description: Define how the selector should be generated.

param.name: spacer
param.description: Set the spacer character for your language name lists

param.name: show_acitve
param.label: Show active language
param.description: Select wether the active language should be shown or not
